ڈاکٹر باربرا لسکوف نے 1968 میں اپنی ڈگری: When did Barbara Liskov receive her degree? Barbara Liskov degree year

After she earned a bachelor's degree in mathematics in 1961 from the University of California, Berkeley, Liskov worked as a computer programmer in Massachusetts, first with the Mitre Corporation and then at Harvard University.
When did Barbara Liskov receive her degree? Barbara Liskov degree year
Barbara Liskov, née Barbara Jane Huberman, was born on November 7, 1939, in California. She earned her BA in mathematics at the University of California, Berkeley in 1961.
ڈاکٹر باربرا لسکوف نے اسٹینفورڈ یونیورسٹ: Where did Dr. Barbara Liskov receive her degree? Dr. Barbara Liskov education background

She enrolled at the University of California at Berkeley, originally as a physics major and then switching to mathematics. Liskov remembers being only one of two women in her classes, and she was too intimidated to say anything in class. She received her bachelor's degree in mathematics in 1961.
Where did Dr. Barbara Liskov receive her degree? Dr. Barbara Liskov education background

She earned her bachelor's degree in mathematics with a minor in physics at the University of California, Berkeley in 1961. At Berkeley, she had only one other female classmate in her major. She applied to graduate mathematics programs at Berkeley and Princeton.
